Esqa never fails! From the packaging to the quality of the product, it's the best. The color matches my skin tone perfectly, it's rare for a local brand to match the color to my skin tone right away. The concealer, bronzer, corrector, and eyebrow pencil are also great. Esqa is asking to be bought in bulk 😆
